entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near 7.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 8 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
